personalInfo.residence: Ooltewah, TN; plays out of Eagle Bluff Golf Club
personalInfo.family: Wife, Cindy; Shelby (9/13/90), Carson (1/4/95), Hadley (4/2/03), Cooper (9/8/05)

tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished seventh at the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament to earn a conditional exemption after shooting 70 on the last day of the tournament in Scottsdale. Was the first-round leader after a 64 and was just one stroke off the 36-hole lead...Won a pair of events on the Sunbelt Senior Tour (Donald Ross Classic, The Memorial).
tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the Nationwide Tour in 1997 and 1999-2000. Finished the 2000 season No. 118 on the money list, a year after his best career showing of 48th in earnings in 1999. Started the final round of the 1999 South Florida Classic two strokes off the lead before finishing a career-best third. Fired a 64 in the final round of the 1999 Ozarks Open to equal that finish (T3). Has made the cut in two of three career starts on the PGA TOUR, with his last a missed cut at the 1992 Chattanooga Classic. Best finish was T22 at the 1991 Chattanooga Classic. In 2006, won the $1 million Tournament of Champions on the U.S. Pro Golf Tour by five strokes. The $180,000 first-place prize helped him secure the money title that season. Winner of the Gateway Tour's Chattanooga event on his home course in 2006. Father is six-time Champions Tour winner and three-time PGA TOUR winner Gibby Gilbert. Earned All-Southeastern Conference honors at Tennessee. Biggest thrill in golf was winning on the U.S. Pro Golf Tour with his daughter caddying, eclipsing his previous biggest moment when he caddied for his father when he won the 1997 Royal Caribbean Classic.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished seventh at the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament to earn a conditional exemption after shooting 70 on the last day of the tournament in Scottsdale. Was the first-round leader after a 64 and was just one stroke off the 36-hole lead...Won a pair of events on the Sunbelt Senior Tour (Donald Ross Classic, The Memorial).

Finished seventh at the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament to earn a conditional exemption after shooting 70 on the last day of the tournament in Scottsdale. Was the first-round leader after a 64 and was just one stroke off the 36-hole lead...Won a pair of events on the Sunbelt Senior Tour (Donald Ross Classic, The Memorial).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Made 91 career starts on the Web.com Tour between 1990-2010 and was exempt on that circuit for three years (1999, 2000 and 2008)...Best year was 1999 when he finished third twice--(South Florida Classic, Ozarks Open).
tourBios.personal: Enjoys being with his family and lists hunting as a hobby...Son of former PGA TOUR and PGA TOUR Champions winner Gibby Gilbert...Played collegiately at the University of Tennessee with former PGA TOUR player Mike Sposa and Jimmy Johnston, who was best known as the caddie for Steve Stricker.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 3rd on the Web.com Tour 2 times.
